All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an Admin entity for the Flipkart system.
AdminController
AdminController provides RESTful web services for administrative operations.
AdminDAOImplementation
Implementation of the AdminDAOInterface for performing CRUD operations related to gyms, gym owners, and users.
AdminDAOInterface
Interface defining the database access operations that need to be implemented for administrative management of gyms, users, and gym owners.
AdminInterface
Interface for administrative functions within the system.
AdminService
Implementation of the AdminInterface providing services for administrative actions such as viewing, verifying, and managing gym owners, gyms, and users.
App
Main application class for the Dropwizard service.
BookingInterface
Interface for managing bookings in the system.
Bookings
Represents a booking in the Flipkart system for gym slots.
BookingService
Service class for managing bookings in the system.
Customer
Represents a Customer in the Flipkart system, extending the User class.
CustomerController
REST controller for managing customer operations.
CustomerDAOImplementation
 
CustomerDAOInterface
CustomerDAOInterface defines the data access operations related to customers, including managing user passwords, booking slots, retrieving gym information, and managing user information.
CustomerInterface
Interface defining the operations available to customers in the system.
CustomerService
CustomerService provides various services related to customers, including booking slots, retrieving gym information, and managing user information.
Gym
Represents a Gym entity in the Flipkart system.
GymOwner
Represents a Gym Owner in the Flipkart system.
GymOwnerController
GymOwnerController provides RESTful web services for gym owner operations, including login, adding gyms, viewing gyms, deleting gyms, and viewing gyms with slots.
GymOwnerDAOImplementation
Implementation of GymOwnerDaoInterface to manage gym owner related operations in the database.
GymOwnerDaoInterface
GymOwnerDaoInterface defines the data access operations related to gym owners, including managing gyms, gym slots, and gym owner authentication and registration.
GymOwnerInterface
GymOwnerInterface defines the operations that can be performed by a gym owner, including managing gyms and gym slots, as well as gym owner authentication and management.
GymOwnerService
GymOwnerService provides the implementation of GymOwnerInterface, allowing gym owners to manage their gyms, view gyms, validate credentials, and update their information.
InvalidCredentialsException
Exception for handling cases where invalid credentials are provided.
JDBCConnection
Manages the JDBC connection to the database for the Flipkart system.
RegistrationFailedException
Exception for handling cases where registration processes fail.
SlotInsertionFailedException
Exception for handling cases where slot insertion into the database fails.
Slots
Represents a time slot in a gym scheduling system.
SlotsUnavailableException
Exception for handling cases where the requested slots are unavailable.
SQLConstants
Contains SQL query constants for various operations related to gym management in the Flipkart system.
User
Represents a User in the Flipkart system.
UserController
Handles user-level actions and provides RESTful API endpoints for user interactions.
VerificationFailedException
Exception for handling cases where verification processes fail.
